column4: hi all...i need help regarding including my floppy disk drive in the fstab file..i didn't find it there and it's not getting detected either...kindly help
you could always mount it manually
automounting a floppy disk can be a pain.
hmm - its showing up under Places/Computer/Floppy for me.. and i dont have an entry in the fstab for the floppy.
i dident need an entry in the fstab.. it showed up under places/computer/Floppy disk
i then right click on it to 'mount' the drive. if you make a fstab entry - then that will override the default gnome mounting system
